input.sentences: about to get some food from the food truck .
the foodie call mardi gras special menu .
the band playing for the crowd .
output.sentences: We weren't sure where to have dinner, but we just happened to see a food truck as we were looking for a restaurant.
The truck had a special menu for Mardi Gras and the food was fantastic.
After eating, we went to the club for ladies night where we were watching a comedian perform.
The location was a really fun place to visit during Mardi Gras.
There was even a band playing in the crowd which was fun and interactive.
